title: My friend started a new playing league and he never got his 500rp why?
body:
Leave a comment on what should he do ?
            And at what lv do you get your free rp

replies.body: You do not get 400 RP at level 3 anymore. This has been replaced with a Premium Hextech Chest at level 5. It will contain an Ashe and Garen shard, either Sherwood Ashe *or* Sanguine Garen shard, and enough essence to craft them.

Should have gave it to me before I purchased them both D:

And 400RP is WAY better than a stupid chest

You don't get 400 rp anymore, you now get a free chest instead. 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp
They don't give out free RP anymore as far as I know. You get IP boost or something instead.
They already stated why. Read the news
Don't you have to register your email or something

Wouldn't this be a pretty clear time to email player support?

I really don't mean to be rude, but that does feel pretty obvious to me at least.  Then again, I suppose I have more experience with player support and thus consider it far quicker than others do.

Just send a ticket to them explaining the situation (attach appropriate screenshots if possible), and they should be able to sort it all out within a couple days.

Edit:  I see now that this has been changed to a free chest (sorry I haven't leveled an account in ~4 years).  I guess just check for that.  It does seem rather disappointing compared to the RP though imo.  RNG is not to my taste.
